name: Hamburger
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 egg, 1/4 cup bread crumbs, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp pepper, 4 hamburger buns , one plate
cooking_method: To cook Hamburger, start by boiling water in a large pot and adding salt to the water. Add macaroni to the boiling water and cook it for about 8-10 minutes or until it's al dente.

name: Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup flour, 2 cups milk, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper to taste
cooking_method: To cook Mac and Cheese, start by boiling water in a large pot and adding salt to the water. Add macaroni to the boiling water and cook it for about 8-10 minutes or until it's al dente.

name: Fried Chicken
ingredients: 2 lbs chicken drumsticks, 2 cups buttermilk, 2 cups flour, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp pepper, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, oil for frying
cooking_method: To cook Fried Chicken, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: BBQ Ribs
ingredients: 3 lbs pork spare ribs, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, BBQ sauce
cooking_method: To cook BBQ Ribs, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Meatloaf
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1/2 cup milk, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1 egg, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper
cooking_method: To cook Meatloaf, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: 4 large potatoes, 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup milk, salt and pepper to taste
cooking_method: To cook Mashed Potatoes, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Chili
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion, 1 green pepper, 2 cans kidney beans, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 can tomato sauce, 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin
cooking_method: To cook Chili, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Cornbread
ingredients: 1 cup cornmeal, 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1 cup milk, 1 egg, 1/4 cup oil
cooking_method: To cook Cornbread, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
ingredients: 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1 onion, 1 cup barbecue sauce, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 4 hamburger buns
cooking_method: To cook Pulled Pork Sandwich, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Buffalo Wings
ingredients: 2 lbs chicken wings, 1/2 cup hot sauce, 1/4 cup melted butter, 1 tbsp honey, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper
cooking_method: To cook Buffalo Wings, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 4 slices bread, 2 tbsp butter, 2 slices cheddar cheese
cooking_method: To cook Grilled Cheese Sandwich, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Corn on the Cob
ingredients: 4 ears of corn, 4 tbsp butter, salt and pepper to taste
cooking_method: To cook Corn on the Cob, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Potato Salad
ingredients: 2 lbs potatoes, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 cup chopped celery, 2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper
cooking_method: To cook Potato Salad, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.

name: Apple Pie
ingredients: 1 pie crust, 6 cups sliced apples, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup flour, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp butter
cooking_method: To cook Apple Pie, start by selecting the right type of ground beef and seasoning it with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Divide the meat into equal portions.
